description:
The Ymir toque is a soft blend of merino wool & acrylic with a folded cuff & jacquard mountain design. It has a woven Ambler patch on the front, and is named after the prominent Ymir (pronounced whymirr) Mountain at Whitewater ski resor. The name Ymir originates in Norse mythology,check it out.

  • Made with 50% merino wool / 50% acrylic
  • Made in Canada
name: Ambler Ymir Toque - Unisex
